messages.content:
edit this code so that it sends .topbeans 100 instead. The bot will respond with multiple lines to keep paring all messages from the bot. Add to the list as they coming, keeping the rank unique and re-rendering as needed. Change the refreshing to 30 seconds between re-issuing the command
